channel.title: Gfx?
channel.description:
Hey guys, where would I go to find the gfx of a monster.
Like now, bronze, iron and steel dragons on my server are pretty messed up, i need to change the way htey attack and die. Where can I find the place to change it? I have a list of different emotes etc. thanks =)
They also dont seem to hit anything? How can I change it.[br][br][size=1][br][br][
